Event.info: OSINT - Update on the Fancy Bear Android malware (poprd30.apk)

Attribute.value: The APK file, that was investigated by Crowd Strike and us is actually corrupt, unzipping yields two warnings and a CRC Error.

Attribute.comment: The repair process consisted of finding and removing an extra byte from the file â€œwarnings.pngâ€. By changing only this byte and getting a valid APK file, this might be the original file. After repair, we got the following file - REPAIRED.apk
Recommended yara for the linux versions
Attribute.value:
rule sofacy_xagent {
meta:
author = "AKG"
description = "Sofacy - XAgent"
strings:
$service = "ksysdefd"
$x1 = "AgentKernel"
$x2 = "Cryptor"
$x3 = "AgentModule"
$x4 = "ChannelController"
$x5 = "RemoteKeylogger"
$a1 = "UNCORRECT DISPLAY NAME"
$a2 = "Keylogger started"
$a3 = "Keylog thread exit"
$a4 = "Keylogger yet started"
condition:
$service or (2 of ($x*)) or (2 of ($a*))
}

Attribute.comment: These XAgent linux samples are very similar to a Windows version that has been found in november, 2013
These XAgent linux samples are very similar to a Windows version that has been found in november, 2013 - Xchecked via VT: 5f6b2a0d1d966fc4f1ed292b46240767f4acb06c13512b0061b434ae2a692fa1
